name: Ike's Mail Service
description:
This is GMTK Game Jam 2022 demo that gonna be reworked soon-ish after! (I think)

Children, don't gamble! 

It's hard to imagine that you can lose all your possessions in one day. Well, imagine that, as our main character did! Now he with the help of luck and dice, which he stole from the casino will have to repay debt, boring and tedious work and you have to help him with it.
